Family Dollar is one of those discount chains that has fared well during this recession as consumers look for ways to scrimp on spending, and it seems the company has been scrimping on how much it pays workers.
Family Dollar has been in an eight-year legal battle about overtime pay all the way up to the Supreme Court, which yesterday declined to hear the company's appeal.
